myText:
When you are being 100% yourself, your life will flow 
effortlessly and love will sparkle in your eyes.

myTitle: Learn to switch off the mind
myText:
When one starts to know how to switch off the mind, 
then one will understand that is how to stop suffering.

Your soul is too expansive to ever be able to fit 
into anybody’s expectations.

myTitle: How long you can be present
myText:
How long you are able to be in the present moment 
will determine how happy you are, how peaceful 
you are or how fearful you are in your life.

To see perfection in everything means we are equally 
happy in the favourable situations and the 
unfavourable situations.

Love and peace are like twins—they come together. 
If you cannot feel peace inside, you will not be able 
to feel love inside you.
All of life is enhanced when you are in the present moment.

When we master the ability to focus or concentrate on 
one point, and remain there for long durations, 
we will be free from emotional suffering.

Heaven is right here, right now. You’re not going to 
find heaven anywhere else.
